document_data.mainbody:
Five Point was the name used by a powerful hybsil druid active in the Silver Marches during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.While not stated in explicitly in Monster Compendium Monsters of Faer√ªn, the name "Five Point" is likely in reference to the number of points on his antlers.
He was always accompanied by his animal companions three dire wolves and an owl.
As of the , Five Point was the leader of the second-largest druid circle in the North. He had become infamous for posting bounties of thirteen gold pieces for the scalps of Zhentarim members in retaliation for their practice of posting bounties on hybasil antlers.
